modName: RR Gold and Steel Elven Blades
summary:
Rendalli\'s Retextures Gold and Steel Elven Blades

Removes the green from the blades of the elven weapons to make them look more appealing.
descriptionHtml:
Rendalli\'s Retextures Gold and Steel Elven Blades

I didnt like the look of the elven weapons.  mainly the green blades.  so i fiddled with them a bit to make them look more like steel blades with elven adornment.

just unzip into main skyrim directory.
author: Rendalli
